items.title: Sell Nifty50, MidCap Select on the rise; Check support & other levels here
items.description: The Nifty 50 Index remains bullish but overbought, indicating a possible near-term correction or profit booking.

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi suggests buying these stocks on September 23
items.description: Recently, Adani Power broke through a key bearish trendline on the daily chart, suggesting a potential reversal in momentum from its previous downtrend.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Gap-up open for Indian markets, signals GIFT Nifty; Asian markets gain
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India equity benchmark indices were likely to start on a positive note on Monday, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures that were trading around 150 points higher.

items.title: Market today: GIFT Nifty up 150 pts; here's your trading guide for Sept 23
items.description: The US Federal Reserve's core inflation data slated to be released on Friday will be eyed closely for further cues on rate cuts

items.title: Osho Krishan of Angel One recommends buying Marico & JSW Energy on Sept 23
items.description: Marico has showcased a strong resurgence from the pivotal support of the previous breakout on the daily time frame chart and has soared to record-high levels.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: HDFC Bank, Adani Total, Max Health, IIFL Finance, APSEZ
items.description: Stocks to Watch: Indian markets were likely to start on a positive note on Monday, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures that were at 25,900, around 150 points ahead of Nifty futures' last close.

items.title: Manba Finance IPO opens today: GMP up 50%; should you subscribe?
items.description: Manba Finance unlisted shares were trading at a premium of Rs 60 in the grey market, reflecting a 50 per cent gain over the IPO's upper end price of Rs 120, underscoring positive investor sentiment

items.title: Govt bond yields seen little changed, focus shifts to domestic triggers
items.description: The benchmark 10-year yield is likely to move between 6.75 per cent and 6.78 per cent on Monday

items.title: Adani Total Gas share up 7% on securing $375 mn funding to expand CGD biz
items.description: Adani Total Gas share price surged after the company announced that global lenders have provided funding worth $275 million to the company.

items.title: FIIs up long bets in Nifty, long-short ratio hops to 3:1; retail add shorts
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 23: FIIs net bought over 1 lakh contracts of Nifty futures and 25,878 contracts of Bank Nifty futures on Friday. Retail investors hold 2 shorts for every long bet.

items.title: Vodafone Idea soars 8% on Rs 30k-cr deal with Nokia, Ericsson, Samsung
items.description: Vodafone Idea concluded Rs 30,000 crore contracts with Nokia, Ericsson, and Samsung

items.title: KEC International surges 3% after bagging orders worth Rs 1,003 cr; details
items.description: Shares of KEC International soared as much as 3.12 per cent on BSE at Rs 972.15 per share on Monday's intraday trade

items.title: BHEL share gains 3% on bagging Rs 6,100-crore thermal power order from NTPC
items.description: The uptick in BHEL share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 6.100 crore from NTPC.

items.title: This Ashish Dhawan-backed pharma stock zoomed over 100% in 2 straight years
items.description: Glenmark Pharma rallied nearly 9% to Rs 1,763.90 after the US drug regulator issued Form 483 with zero observations for its formulation manufacturing facility in Aurangabad.

items.title: Bikaji Foods Int'l share hits record high on incorporating unit; details
items.description: The shares of the snack manufacturer surged after the company announced that it has secured Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) approval to incorporate a wholly-owned subsidiary, Bikaji Foods Retail.

items.title: IPO fever hits D-Street: 10 opening, 13 listing to lure investors next week
items.description: Maintaining its momentum, the Indian primary market is poised to captivate investors in the next week, with the launch of two mainline, and as many as eight SME initial public offerings (IPOs)

items.title: Arkade Developers IPO: 50% listing gain on cards? Check GMP, expected price
items.description: Arkade Developers shares are expected to make their market debut with listing on the BSE, and NSE tomorrow; here's what GMP hints about listing

items.title: Fusion Finance tanks 10%, hits record low on higher ECL provisioning in Q2
items.description: Fusion Finance said it may be required to make an estimated credit loss (ECL) provisioning between Rs 500 crore to Rs 550 crore in Q2FY25 as compared to Rs 348 crore provision in Q1FY25.

items.title: Hind Rectifiers hits 5% upper circuit on order from Indian Railways
items.description: Hind Rectifiers share price locked in 5 per cent upper circuit at Rs 856.65 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday deals

items.title: SBFC Finance hits life high as CARE upgrades co's bank facilities' ratings
items.description: SBFC Finance's long-term fund-based term loan of Rs 2,100 crore was upgraded to 'AA-' with a stable outlook by CARE, while the rating on its Rs 1,400-crore bank facility was upgraded and withdrawn

items.title: HFCL up 6%, at 52-wk high on deal to supply drone parts to General Atomics
items.description: HFCL is developing drone detection radar, which is expected to become a crucial element in modern drone detection systems.

items.title: JSW Infra rises 5% on receiving delivery of 2nd dredger from Netherlands
items.description: JSW Infrastructure got the delivery of the second dredger which aligns with the company's FY2030 growth plan to boost capacity

items.title: RPower up 5%, hits 7-yr high ahead of board meeting to consider fundraise
items.description: Reliance Power shares are quoting higher for the eighth straight trading day, having surged 29 per cent during the period.

items.title: Unichem Labs shares jump 4% after announcing consolidation of US generics
items.description: Unichem Laboratories share price surged up to 4.1 5 per cent at Rs 671.55 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday trade

items.title: Northern Arc IPO listing buzz: GMP resurges 55%; check likely listing price
items.description: Northern Arc Capital shares are poised for their market debut tomorrow. Here's what GMP trends indicate about the listing prospects

items.title: SpiceJet soars 10% as company successfully raises Rs 3,000 crore via QIP
items.description: SpiceJet's board approved the issue and allotment of 48,70,12,986 equity shares to eligible qualified institutional buyers

items.title: This smallcap NBFC stock rose 5% ahead of Board meeting to raise funds
items.description: The shares of Ugro Capital rose ahead of the company's scheduled board meet on September 24 to consider fund raising.

items.title: Aadhar Housing rallies 6%, hits record high; JM Financial sees more upside
items.description: JM Financial Institutional Securities has initiated coverage on Aadhar Housing Finance with a 'Buy' rating and a target price of Rs 600

items.title: PSP Projects shares climb up 5% on receiving orders worth Rs 555 cr
items.description: Shares of PSP Projects, a civil construction firm jumped 5.10 per cent at Rs 708.90 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday trade
